title: I scored 94 percent in my tenth. Am I an average student? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends upon how you look at yourself. For many people getting 98% would be a far less than their expectations and it would make them consider themselves below average whereas there are people for whom getting over 60% marks would take them into ‘genius’ league among their friends. It depends on many aspects of life of an individual. If your teachers, relatives and friends circle have a notion that 94% would be an average marks, then what can I say to those thousands of government schools where getting over 70% has become a dream for millions of government school children. Isn't there getting 70% is the benchmark of being best for lakhs of those high school kids? Hence, it's only a matter of perception and generalisation of the people you are living with. Instead of getting affected by their unnecessary criticisms and comparisons, rather your emphasis should be on your satisfaction in studying and also your satisfaction in giving exams. Good luck Thank you for A2A

I scored 74.8% in 10th, and then cracked JEE main w/ 98.68 percentile , then JEE advanced with 7358 rank. And moreover, I got 92% in Class 12 boards. Look, nobody holds the right to rate you as average or topper or below average. It's you who define yourself and make you a better person. Gear up. You have scored almost 10% more than me, so you can make it to top colleges better. Peace, and never underestimate yourself.

Marks of class 10th may give a broad hint about a student but can not be a definite parameter of judging somebody's talent. I come across many students who struggle during 11–12th class despite scoring very good in 10th while there is no dearth of students who pick up like anything in class 11th. There is yet another very important aspect noticed among many students where some perform extraordinarily in competitive exams while others are very good in their boards.
Now even 100/100 scorer thinks himself below average. ( However 94% is not a less score - why to squeeze yourself unnecessarily. God has already written what is in store for you good luck. Relax

I will say just one thing you were a top notch student till class 10 But future will depend on your present not past so do well just don't get distracted in next two years you are already in good line just maintain it That's it Stay home stay safe 🙂🙂
Hi!! Yes not a average students but a very good student I think you are because average students can score between 85–90percentage generally. Hope this answer is helpful to you Thank you!!
